CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( amc__Project__r.amc__Billing_Type__c , "Fixed Price") , IF(amc__Milestone_Budget__c > 0, amc__Milestone_Budget__c, (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c)) - (amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c), (amc__Hours_Completed_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c ) - (amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c+ amc__Expense_Summary__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the P&L for the Milestone based on the Actual figures. If Fixed Price and Budget > 0, use Milestone Budget, otherwise use Hours Scheduled Billable Value. If Not FP, use Completed Billable and Cost Values
CustomField.label: P&L (Actual)
